VelmaStartups.properties.notesText:
# ================================================= NOTE: Streamflow gauge was placed at x=284, y=236. Can use x=106, y=406 for testing as it is a much smaller upstream area.
# ================================================= 04/15/2021 - Setting be=1.5 -> 0.95 soilColumnDepth=2500 -> 3000
# ================================================= 04/14/2021 - soilColumnDepth=1900 -> 2500 (siltloam) - Setting be=2.8 -> 1.5 - Setting ksv=0.001 -> 0.002 (siltloam), -> 0.00175 (siltyclayloam) - Setting ksl=0.004 -> 0.00135
# ================================================= 04/13/2021 - Setting setSoilLayerWeights=0.1, 0.2, 0.3, 0.4 -> 0.18, 0.24, 0.285, 0.3 - Setting ksv=0.0007 -> 0.001 - Setting surfaceKs=3800 -> 4000 (siltloam), 3600 -> 3800 (siltyclayloam)
# ================================================= 02/10/2021 - Turning on penumbra stream temp modeling - Setting setStreamTemperatureModel=BASELINE_LINEAR -> USFS_DERIVED - Added 15 cell data writers at streamflow gauge and upstream (ellsworth_baseline_03_07_21)
# ================================================= 01/28/2021 - Setting ksv=0.001 -> 0.0007, ksl=0.001 -> 0.004 (ellsworth_baseline_03_07_12)
# ================================================= 01/27/2021
- Setting soil layer thicknesses to 0.1, 0.2, 0.3, 0.4 (ellsworth_baseline_03_07_11)
# ================================================= 01/26/2021
- Setting soil layer thicknesses to 0.15, 0.2, 0.3, 0.35 - Setting ks decay factors to 0.000 decimal places. (ellsworth_baseline_03_07_8)
- Using 2003-2007 runoff (ellsworth_baseline_03_07_3) # ================================================= 01/22/2021
- Setting be=1.3 -> 2.8 - Setting surfaceKs=3000 ->3800 (siltloam), =2800 -> 3600 (siltyclayloam) (ellsworth_baseline_04_07_45)
# ================================================= 01/21/2021
- Setting be=0.9 -> 1.3 (ellsworth_baseline_04_07_40)
# ================================================= 01/20/2021
- Setting ksLateralExponentialDecayFactor=0.002 -> 0.00002 (siltloam), =0.00175 -> 0.0000175 (siltyclayloam) (ellsworth_baseline_04_07_34)
# ================================================= 01/19/2021
- Setting ksVerticalExponentialDecayFactor=0.00135 -> 0.0000135 (ellsworth_baseline_04_07_32)
- Setting soilColumnDepth=1500 -> 2500 (siltloam); =1500->2500 (siltyclayloam) - Setting surfaceKs=1500 ->2500 (siltloam), =1250 -> 2000 (siltyclayloam) (ellsworth_baseline_04_07_29)
# ================================================= 01/12/2021
- Using the average of PRISM and GHCND gauge precipitation measurements (ellsworth_baseline_04_07_13_avg)
# ================================================= 01/05/2021
- Setting surfaceKs=1250 -> 1500 (siltloam), 1000 -> 1250 (siltclayloam)
(ellsworth_baseline_04_07_13)
# ================================================= 01/05/2021
- Setting surfaceKs=1050 -> 1250 (siltloam), 750 -> 900 (siltclayloam) - Setting be=0.75 -> 0.9 to increase AET/PET ratio
(ellsworth_baseline_04_07_10)
# ================================================= 01/04/2021
- Setting surfaceKs=700 -> 1050 (siltloam), 320 -> 750 (siltclayloam)
(ellsworth_baseline_04_07_9)
- Used gauge data from Naselle River (USC00455774) instead of PRISM
(ellsworth_baseline_04_07_6)
- Setting setInflowCapacityLimiterMode=TOP_LAYER -> ALL_LAYERS (to recover NSE loss moving from VELMA 2.0 to 2.1, see Bob's 12/23/2020 email) - Set all conifer parameters to Gray's XML to avoid PET=0. - humusCtoN, humusNmaxDecay, initialHumusCarbon, missing from Gray's, so keeping blank for now
# ================================================= 12/22/2020 - Lowering be to 0.118 based on Naselle River value here (https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/action/downloadSupplement?doi=10.1111%2Fjawr.12010&file=jawr12010_sm_TableS1.pdf)
WAS USING VELMA 2.0 - NOW RUNNING IN VELMA 2.1
# ================================================= 12/20/2020 - Still getting water balance issues (not convering for 1 instance, and allwb=0.046067 outside acceptable range [-0.040000, 0.040000]
# ================================================= 12/16/2020 - Changed display max settings to fit range of temp, precip, runoff values - Was accidentally using incomplete precip/temp data for temp/rainDriverDataFileName
# ================================================= 12/15/2020 - Adding restoration thinning for all active basins and non-experimental stands - Added historical cuts using Hansen yearly forest loss as fitler maps (need to check with forestry team re: what harvest % these should be, look like 0.7 or so) - Using historical_age_2004.asc for cover age; assuming every pixel that is cut from 2004-2019 is 40yrs old.
# ================================================= 12/11/2020 - Adding permeability map (doens't seem to make much of a difference in NS)
# ================================================= 12/10/2020 - Was using incorrect precip/runoff/emp data - added in correct dates
# ================================================= 12/09/2020 - Runoff chart wasn't displaying, set min/max display values from Blue River XML
# ================================================= 12/08/2020 Fixed water balance not converging problem by: - Setting iteration=100 - Setting errthreshold = 0.010 - Setting setSoilTemperatureModel = SWAT_DERIVED (had to import from Gray's) - Adding runoff back - Not sure how to get chart display of runoff, Y values are all 0
# ================================================= 12/07/2020 - Iterations=100 for debugging - Using soil (silt loam/silty clay loam) and calibration parameters from Gray's XML - Running with and without runoff data both returns water balance error and shutdown. "Error in storage=1.4210854715202004E-14, ksv=327.57117,ksl=227.25673"
# ================================================= 12/02/2020 - Trying to identify source of water balance not converging - Removing disturbances - Removing runoff
